title: José López - Portfolio
aboutText1: Results-oriented Full-Stack Web Developer with over 4 years of experience delivering high-impact web solutions for various sectors, from national supermarket chains to healthcare companies and distributors. Demonstrated ability to translate complex business requirements into scalable technical solutions, including complete technology migrations and full-stack digitalization systems.
aboutText2: Specialist in ASP.NET, React, Angular and Vue, with experience in projects ranging from administrative dashboards to enterprise management systems that significantly improve operational efficiency.
projectsDescription: Some of the outstanding projects I have worked on:

projects.title: WMS System for Latin American Company
projects.description: Developed a WMS system for a Latin American company with branches in Central America along with SAP (System Applications and Products in Data Processing) integration for inventory control and company logistics integration.

projects.title: Internal Supermarket Web Portal
projects.description: Created views and functionalities using ASP.NET and SQL Server oriented to the internal system of a national supermarket chain.

projects.title: Panther Healthcare México Web Portal
projects.description: Developed the complete migration of the Panther Healthcare México portal from PHP to ASP.NET Razor Pages, implementing a multi-language translation system.

projects.title: Nabors Industries Administrative System
projects.description: Developed final modules and new functionalities in Angular for the Nabors Industries administrative system.

projects.title: MendoGlass Argentina Digitalization System
projects.description: Developed a complete full-stack digitalization system for MendoGlass Argentina using Vue on the front-end, and ASP.NET with SQL Server on the back-end.
